full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GYI RTZA BRGYUD GYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI PA ZHES AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR, ^SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS THA SHAL BA, BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA, LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BAS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB PAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS PAR MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,'GRO BA THAMS CAD LA DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL,
